room_title: Escape room "Midnight at Ravenloft" by The Exit Room in Kansas City
review: Great time in the Midnight at Ravenloft room. Staff was friendly and well prepared for all questions. Room was well put together. Great time with friends!

room_title: Escape room "Midnight at Ravenloft" by The Exit Room in Kansas City
review: I reserved Night at Ravenloft with my family and friends for my birthday. We all had a great time. The staff was very friendly and the room was well decorated. I will definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "Midnight at Ravenloft" by The Exit Room in Kansas City
review: My group had such a fun time, the room was challenging and the staff was extra friendly! We will definitely go back and try again!

room_title: Escape room "Midnight at Ravenloft" by The Exit Room in Kansas City
review: Well done. Very creative. A wonderful place to have to interact with others to get the job done. I would highly recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "Midnight at Ravenloft" by The Exit Room in Kansas City
review: This is the third escape room we have done in the Kansas City area and this was so much fun, my favorite so far! I loved that we didn't have to share the room with people we didn't know because that can be uncomfortable and there was plenty for each person participating to do! It was a blast and we would highly recommend The Exit Room to our friends and family!
